name: Queen of Wands
fortune_telling: This card represents a woman with an attractive, appealing personality, likely born between March 11th and April 20th, who wants to charm you into doing things her way

light: Helping others focus on the issue at hand
Bringing people together, despite their differences
shadow: Being distracted, or using your charms or skills to distract others from the goal
Calling attention to yourself with negative or unhealthy behaviors
Disrupting group activities as a means of feeding your own ego

Questions to Ask: How can I draw people's attention to what we have in common?
To what extent am I able to convince people to do what I want them to do?
